title: [GAMEPLAY] Winter Wonder Lulu's passive VFX bug when Ashe is in the same game

replies.body:
Hey! 

I tried loading WW Lulu up with Ashe both on the ally and enemy teams and I wasn't able to get a repro. :c Would you have any additional steps/information?
I honestly don't know how to trigger that bug, but it could have something to do with directly shielding an ally.
Hmm. Okie, lemme take another stab at it.
